definitions.text: a farm tool having one or more heavy blades to break the soil and cut a furrow prior to sowing
to break and turn over earth especially with a plow
examples: Farmer Jones plowed his east field last week
turn the earth in the Spring

definitions.text: act on verbally or in some form of artistic expression
examples: The course covered all of Western Civilization
The new book treats the history of China

definitions.text: move in a way resembling that of a plow cutting into or going through the soil
examples: The ship plowed through the water
